items: Phase 1: Programming Foundations - Have you completed the Python data analysis and web scraping projects?
Phase 2: Statistics & Math - Do you understand descriptive statistics, distributions, and linear algebra for ML?
Phase 3: Databases - Can you connect to and query MySQL, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB?
Phase 4: Machine Learning - Have you trained and evaluated Classification and Regression models using Scikit-learn?
Phase 5: Deep Learning - Have you built and trained a CNN for image classification using TensorFlow or PyTorch?
Phase 6: NLP - Have you implemented text classification and summarization using NLTK/SpaCy and Transformers?
Phase 7: Generative AI & LLMs - Have you built a chatbot or RAG system using LangChain and OpenAI/Anthropic APIs?
Phase 8: MLOps - Have you deployed a model using Docker and set up experiment tracking with MLflow?
Phase 9: End-to-End - Have you delivered a full-stack AI application with CI/CD pipelines?
